content:
Brew the highest octane coffee in town. Careful, you may need a prescription. We open at 6am sharp for those in need of a jolt on the way to the office. Breakfast is optional, unless you’re looking for the best eggs in town.

Full breakfast daily and our homemade grab n’ go is a great way to take the Padre to your desk.

SPECIALS

Coffee

  • Purchase a Farmacy thermos and pay only $2 for regular coffee when you bring it in. Thermos are also available to purchase for $20.
  • Loyalty card: "Double Stamp Day" every Thursday

Wine

  • Purchase 6 bottles together in Farmacy and receive a complimentary Padre wine tote.Totes are also available to purchase for $10.
  • Bring your Padre wine tote in for your wine purchases and receive 10% off every bottle OR purchase 5 bottles with the Padre tote and receive a 6th bottle free.
